/usr/bin/c++   -g -O3 -Wno-deprecated-declarations -Wno-unused-result   CMakeFiles/mesh_segment.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/mesh_segment.dir/init_shader.cpp.o  -o mesh_segment /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libGLU.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libGL.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libglut.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libXmu.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libXi.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libGLEW.so /usr/lib/libassimp.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libglut.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libXmu.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libXi.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libGLEW.so /usr/lib/libassimp.so
